title: Adobe security advisory (AV25-823)
description: On December 9, 2025, Adobe published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)   version AEM Cloud Service (CS)
Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)   version 6.5 LTS, version 6.5.23 and prior
Adobe DNG Software Development Kit (SDK)   version DNG SDK 1.7.0 and prior
Acrobat Reader DC   version 25.001.20982 and prior
Creative Cloud Desktop Application   version 6.4.0.361 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
